The Jezabels

Art direction and design for Aria award winning band, The Jezabels.
Photography by Christopher Doyle, Pierre Toussaint and Robbie Powell.

Everything Begins

Naming, logomark and site design for Sydney based online emporium of goodness.

Chet Faker

Art direction and design for Chet Faker's debut EP.
Photography by Jefton Sungkar.

Bell Shakespeare 2012 Season

Art direction, typography and design for Bell Shakespeare's 2012 Season.
Designed with Joao Peres at Interbrand, Sydney.

New Theatre

Identity design and season collateral for Sydney’s oldest independent theatre.
Designed with Eric Ng, Diana Chirilas and Mike Rigby at Interbrand, Sydney.

Cloak and Dagger

A recruitment identity that avoids any reference to recruitment whatsoever –
Cloak & Dagger: online emporium of coats and knives (and jobs).
Designed with Jefton Sungkar at Interbrand, Sydney.

Desktop Magazine

A rotatable cover for Desktop Magazine’s music issue.

Holly

Logomark for Holly, Sydney’s oldest digital agency.

Tourism Australia

Art direction and design for Tourism Australia’s new logomark.
Designed with Joao Peres and Diana Chirilas at Interbrand, Sydney.

Bob Gill

Lecture posters for legendary designer Bob Gill’s first Australian visit.
Designed at Saatchi Design.

Incubator

Logomark for a UK based artists foundation.

Newtown Flicks

Identity and posters for a Newtown based independent short film festival.

SYO

Logomark for the Sydney Youth Orchestra.
Designed at Saatchi Design.

Brisbane City

Logomark for Brisbane’s CBD.
Designed at Interbrand, Sydney.
